messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Jing what is the shortest path to Raj? Starting from Jing, please list the scholar names in order, including Jing, separated by commas.

First, I will identify the connections from Jing. Jing is connected to Amir, Nisha, Raj, Pam, and Wim. 

Second, I will check each of these connections to see if they are directly connected to Raj. 

Amir is not directly connected to Raj. 
Nisha is directly connected to Raj. 
Raj is directly connected to himself. 
Pam is not directly connected to Raj. 
Wim is directly connected to Raj. 

Third, I will choose the shortest path. The shortest path from Jing to Raj is directly from Jing to Raj. 

Answer: Jing, Raj
